summary: This is an email from an FBI agent forwarding a lead from The Guardian newspaper to be investigated by the FBI's Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking squad in New York. It includes an attachment, likely containing the lead details.

persons.name: MIMa
persons.context: Appears as the sender of an email forwarding a Guardian newspaper lead to the FBI's Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking squad for investigation.

events.title: Guardian Lead Forwarded to FBI
events.description: An FBI agent forwards a lead from The Guardian newspaper to the FBI New York office's Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking squad for investigation.

keyFacts: The FBI's Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking squad (C-20) in New York was actively receiving investigative leads as of April 2020.
The lead originated from The Guardian newspaper, indicating media sources were being used in the investigation.
The communication shows ongoing investigative activity related to crimes against children and human trafficking.
